channel.title: The official RS2 is shit thread
channel.description: i think we can agree on this, around here.

item.title: The official RS2 is shit thread
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Errorist, post:26, topic:349326”][quote author=Frell link=topic=445700.msg3272647#msg3272647 date=1279321922]

You shouldn’t have to ‘‘abuse the grand exchange’’ in order to transfer money or items you waste your life getting. That’s probably the most retarded idea ever. What a cool game its in 3D!

You’ve never been allowed to transfer money.
[/quote] Oh okay, you can’t find a decent excuse for RS2’s lack of an economy so you’re going to argue the transfer money wording.

Money = Cash = GP [/quote]
you were talking about transferring money between accounts right?

Read full topic
item.source: The official RS2 is shit thread

[/quote]
You’ve never been allowed to transfer money.[/quote] Oh okay, you can’t find a decent excuse for RS2’s lack of an economy so you’re going to argue the transfer money wording.

Your thread title was a bit off… I fixed it free of charge!

Haha feel free to change it back.

Can’t we have our opinions of RS2 in our RSC section?
[/quote]

You sure can, I was only messing around with xEnt :o

I like RSC about the same as RS2 actually.[/quote]
Ohhh fuck me.

item.title: The official RS2 is shit thread
item.dc:creator: @Errorist Errorist
item.description:
@Errorist wrote:

It actually took skill to be a good PK’er on RSC. You had to know how to follow correctly, when to click, when to run so you don’t take an extra hit, how to manage prayer (Because in RSC there aren’t 19 different kinds of dragons to easily give everyone 70+ prayer in no time) A lot more than I listed.

I remember my friend showing me an RS2 war and it was people going “All on Kryptix” and 30 guys would attack that player. Disgusting.

Read full topic
item.source: The official RS2 is shit thread
